perturbation.original_text: Capitalized terms not defined in this Amendment shall have the meanings as assigned thereto in the JV Agreement. RECITALS (A)The Autoliv Parties and the Nissin Parties entered into the JV Agreement as of March 7, 2016 to engage in the JV Business through Veoneer Nissin Brake Systems Japan, Co., Ltd. ("VNBJ"), Veoneer Nissin Brake Systems America, LLC (whose corporate name has since been changed to Veoneer Brake Systems, LLC, "VNBA"), Veoneer Nissin Brake Systems (Zhongshan), Co., Ltd. ("VNBZ") and Autoliv Nissin Brake Research Asia Co., Ltd. ("ANRA");
perturbation.changed_text: Capitalized terms not defined in this Amendment shall have the meanings as assigned thereto in the JV Agreement. RECITALS (A)The Autoliv Parties and the Nissin Parties entered into the JV Agreement as of March 7, 2016 to engage in the JV Business through Veoneer Nissin Brake Systems Japan, Co., Ltd. ("VNBJ"), Veoneer Nissin Brake Systems America, LLC (whose corporate name has since been changed to Veoneer Brake Systems, LLC, "VB Systems"), Veoneer Nissin Brake Systems (Zhongshan), Co., Ltd. ("VNBZ") and Autoliv Nissin Brake Research Asia Co., Ltd. ("ANRA");
perturbation.explanation: The change from "VNBA" to "VB Systems" for Veoneer Nissin Brake Systems America, LLC introduces ambiguity. While it mentions the name change, using a completely different abbreviation creates confusion about whether "VNBA" and "VB Systems" refer to the same entity throughout the document.

perturbation.original_text: a.As of the VNBJ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires. b.As of the VNBZ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBZ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBZ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBJ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires.
perturbation.changed_text: a.As of the VNBJ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBJ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBJ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Company" or "Companies" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBZ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires. b.As of the VNBZ Closing, except as expressly set forth in this Amendment, the JV Agreement shall immediately cease to have any application or effect with respect to VNBZ, all rights and obligations with respect to VNBZ under the JV Agreement shall terminate and all references to "Entity" or "Entities" in the JV Agreement (either in the body of the JV Agreement or its schedules and other attachments) shall read and be interpreted to mean VNBJ and/or ANRA except as the context otherwise requires.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "Company" or "Companies" to "Entity" or "Entities" in section b. creates a contradiction. While seemingly similar, the contract uses 'Company' as a defined term. Using 'Entity' in section b. introduces uncertainty about whether 'Entity' refers to the same scope of organizations as 'Company,' potentially altering the interpretation of obligations after the VNBZ Closing.
perturbation.location: Article 1.Amendment and Termination of JV Agreement

perturbation.original_text: d.Notwithstanding Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall not release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable.
perturbation.changed_text: d.Notwithstanding Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall not release any Veoneer Associate or any Nissin Associate from liability for the breach of any of its representations, guarantees, undertakings or understandings set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party' with 'Veoneer Associate or any Nissin Associate' and then 'representations, warranties, covenants or agreements' to 'representations, guarantees, undertakings or understandings' without defining associates or giving a specific meaning to the new wording makes the terms within d. more vague. It is not clear who or what constitutes an associate or what a guarantee/undertaking/understanding is. This will cause serious legal problems due to conflicting definitions.
perturbation.location: Article 1.Amendment and Termination of JV Agreement
